original_text: And as they fled before Israel, while they were going down the ascent of Beth-horon, the Lord threw down large stones from heaven on them as far as Azekah, and they died. There were more who died because of the hailstones than the sons of Israel killed with the sword.
korean_text: 그들이 이스라엘 앞에서 도망하여 벧 호론의 비탈에서 내려갈 때에 여호와께서 하늘에서 큰 우박 덩이를 아세가에 이르기까지 내리시매 그들이 죽었으니 이스라엘 자손의 칼에 죽은 자보다 우박에 죽은 자가 더 많았더라

sentences.original_text: And as they fled before Israel
while they were going down the ascent of Beth-horon
the Lord threw down large stones from heaven on them
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 하늘에서 큰 돌들을 그들 위로 던지시니

sentences.original_text: There were more who died because of the hailstones
than the sons of Israel killed with the sword
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 자손이 칼로 죽인 자보다 더 많았더라
